sections.heading: CONFUSIONArt. 1903. Union of qualities of obligee and obligorWhen the qualities of obligee and obligor are united in the same person, the obligation is extinguished by confusion
sections.text: Acts 1984, No. 331, ยง1, eff. Jan. 1, 1985.
